TargetName: DEL-03-02: Turn Execution API + SSE Streaming
Statement: Session boot is a prerequisite for turn execution. DEL-03-02 depends on a successfully booted session to execute turns.
EvidenceQuote: Session boot is a prerequisite for turn execution. DEL-03-02 depends on a successfully booted session
Notes: FACT. Guidance C4 explicitly states the prerequisite relationship and the interface contract (boot produces session record with claudeSessionId consumed by turn execution).

TargetName: DEL-03-03: Turn Options Mapping & Fallback Chains
Statement: DEL-03-01 covers the boot-time opts subset; DEL-03-03 covers the full runtime opts mapping during turn execution. Boot-time resolved opts feed into DEL-03-03 domain.
EvidenceQuote: This deliverable covers the boot-time subset; full runtime mapping during turn execution is DEL-03-03's responsibility
Notes: FACT. Guidance C5 describes the interface boundary between boot-time opts (DEL-03-01) and full opts mapping (DEL-03-03).

TargetName: DEL-05-01: Instruction Root Bundling & Runtime Access
Statement: Session boot must correctly resolve Instruction Root for persona/prompt construction. DEL-05-01 defines the Instruction Root bundling contract that constrains this deliverable.
SourceRef: Requirements > REQ-09: Instruction Root vs Working Root Separation
EvidenceQuote: SOW-013 (covered by DEL-05-01 but constrains this deliverable's implementation)
Notes: FACT. REQ-09 explicitly states DEL-05-01 constrains this deliverable. Boot sequence must resolve Instruction Root per DEL-05-01 contract.

TargetName: DEL-03-05: Anthropic Provider Integration & Key Provisioning Contract
Statement: Boot sequence executes a bootstrap turn via AgentSdkManager which requires Anthropic SDK integration. DEL-03-05 covers provider integration and key provisioning required before boot can call the SDK.
EvidenceQuote: Execute a bootstrap turn via AgentSdkManager
Notes: FACT. REQ-05 step 3 requires AgentSdkManager to execute a bootstrap turn via the Anthropic SDK. DEL-03-05 covers the provider integration contract.  HUMAN_RULING_2026-02-22: Reclassified from PREREQUISITE to INTERFACE to break hard SCC; bootstrap/provider integration may proceed via staged contract-first development.
